meanings.definition: A thermodynamic process in which volume remains constant.
meanings.sent1: During the experiment, the scientist observed the isochor to study the constant volume.
meanings.sent2: The isochor on the graph showed the volume staying the same throughout the process.
meanings.sent3: The isochor decided to stay put and not change its volume, much to the surprise of the other lines.
meanings.sent4: The isochor stood out like a bold line on the graph, representing the unchanging volume.
meanings.sent5: In the story, the isochor was like a character that never altered its volume, making it a memorable figure.

meanings.definition: A line on a graph representing a constant volume.
meanings.sent1: The isochor on the chart clearly showed the constant volume over time.
meanings.sent2: When analyzing the data, the researchers paid close attention to the isochor indicating unchanging volume.
meanings.sent3: The isochor seemed to be the ruler of the graph, always maintaining the same volume.
meanings.sent4: The isochor was like a steady heartbeat on the graph, never fluctuating in volume.
meanings.sent5: The isochor's presence on the graph was as clear as day, representing the constant volume with precision.
